tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was wonderful. They were so pleasant and serene. I was actually panicking because I had previously had treatment for property teeth, but it was extremely painful, so I was terrified. However, the doctor handled me extremely well. Even she put me at ease. To be honest, she treated me with respect and made the situation much less painful. Now for every treatment I'm going to them

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The care given to the treatment was commendable. The Doctor explained everything patiently & discussed each & every step taken! Lots of importance was given to aesthetics & long term stability of the crown. He accompanied me to the lab to ensure that the colour matching was perfect! 
I am very happy with the final result!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
No one likes a visit to the dentist. But Dr. Aziz’s clinic is the closest it can get to actually enjoying a visit, if it’s possible. 

The procedure was so unexpectedly smooth, especially after my dentist in the US told me it’s practically impossible for him to help my tooth situation. The doc is worth his weight in gold tooth fillings !!

tags: None
review: Was devastated with missing front tooth for a year but now very happy with Zirconia crowns. Very impressed with the esthetics and the results. It looks very natural. Dr safoora and Dr fathima  was caring and made me feel very comfortable. I would recommend my friends and family in the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Israel made the procedure very smooth for me. He was very friendly and quite supportive. Even the support staff was very supportive

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Had to extract some milk teeth for my daughter, he was extremely patient and friendly with her and full credit goes to him in convincing my girl to get the job done!! 
His entire team of doctors are very friendly and comfortable to reach too!
